Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer --Updated for R15 avatars by StarWars
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
InnerPart = Tool:WaitForChild("Inner"):Clone() InnerPart.Transparency = 0
BasePart = Tool:WaitForChild("Blade"):Clone() BasePart.Transparency = 0.5 for i, v in ipairs(BasePart:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("SurfaceLight") then v.Enabled = true end end BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Neon BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false BasePart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Electric blue")
BaseBlade = BasePart:Clone() BaseBlade.Name = "Blade" BaseBlade.Reflectance = 0 BaseBlade.Transparency = 0.5 BaseBlade.Size = Vector3.new(0.25, 5.25, 0.25) BaseBlade.CanCollide = false BaseInner = InnerPart:Clone()
--for i, v in pairs({"Top", "Bottom", "Left", "Right", "Front", "Back"}) do -- local Light = Instance.new("SurfaceLight") -- Light.Name = "Light" -- Light.Angle = 180 -- Light.Brightness = 25 -- Light.Range = 5 -- Light.Color = Color3.new((0 / 255), (255 / 255), (255 / 255)) -- Light.Face = Enum.NormalId[v] -- Light.Shadows = false -- Light.Enabled = true -- Light.Parent = BaseBlade --end
Animations = { Equip = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Equip"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 4, Duration = 1.5}, Bash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Bash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 1.25, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, --SidewaysJab = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("SidewaysJab"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 2, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, Slash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Slash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, InwardSlash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("InwardSlash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, OutwardSlash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("OutwardSlash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, UpwardSlash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("UpwardSlash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, Spin = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Spin"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, DownwardIdlePose = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("DownwardIdlePose"), FadeTime = 0.25, Weight = nil, Speed = 1, Duration = 1, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, SideStepUpperSlash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("SideStepUpperSlash"), FadeTime = 0.25, Weight = nil, Speed = 1.5, Duration = 1, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, --SideStepSpin = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("SideStepSpin"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 0.75, Duration = 1, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, Swipe = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swipe"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 1.5, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}},
R15Equip = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15Equip"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 4, Duration = 1.5}, R15Bash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15Bash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 1.25, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}},
R15Slash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15Slash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, R15InwardSlash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15InwardSlash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, R15OutwardSlash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15OutwardSlash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, R15UpwardSlash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15UpwardSlash"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, R15Spin = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15Spin"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, R15DownwardIdlePose = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15DownwardIdlePose"), FadeTime = 0.25, Weight = nil, Speed = 1, Duration = 1, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, R15SideStepUpperSlash = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15SideStepUpperSlash"), FadeTime = 0.25, Weight = nil, Speed = 1.5, Duration = 1, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}},
R15Swipe = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15Swipe"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 1.5, Duration = 0.5, Damage = {Min = 10, Max = 15}}, }
Sounds = { Equip = {Sound = Handle:WaitForChild("Equip")}, Unequip = {Sound = Handle:WaitForChild("Unequip")}, HitWall = {Sound = Handle:WaitForChild("HitWall")}, HitPlayer = {Sound = Handle:WaitForChild("HitPlayer"), Pitch = {Min = 1.25, Max = 1.75}}, Slash1 = {Sound = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash1"), Pitch = {Min = 1, Max = 1.1}}, Slash2 = {Sound = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash2"), Pitch = {Min = 1, Max = 1.5}}, Slash3 = {Sound = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash3"), Pitch = {Min = 1, Max = 1.25}}, }
TouchDamage = {Min = 5, Max = 5}
Rate = (1 / 60)
HitSoundDelay = 0.4 HitSoundPlayable = true
ToolActive = false ToolEquipped = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Tool.Enabled = true
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Blow(Part) local TouchedConnection = Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped or not ToolActive then return end
local character = Hit.Parent if character == Character or character == Tool then return end
local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) if player and (IsTeamMate(Player, player) or player == Player) then return end
local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or Character:FindFirstChild("RightHand") if not RightArm then return end local RightGrip = RightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if not RightGrip or (RightGrip.Part0 ~= RightArm and RightGrip.Part1 ~= RightArm) then return end
local humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if character == Character or not humanoid or humanoid.Health == 0 then if CurrentAnimation and HitSoundPlayable then HitSoundPlayable = false local SoundCopy = Sounds.HitWall.Sound:Clone() Debris:AddItem(SoundCopy, 1.5) SoundCopy.Parent = Blade SoundCopy:Play() Delay(HitSoundDelay, (function() HitSoundPlayable = true end)) end return end
if CurrentAnimation and HitSoundPlayable then HitSoundPlayable = false local Sound = Sounds.HitPlayer local SoundCopy = Sound.Sound:Clone() SoundCopy.Pitch = (math.random((Sound.Pitch.Min * 1000), (Sound.Pitch.Max * 1000)) * 0.001) Debris:AddItem(SoundCopy, 1.5) SoundCopy.Parent = Blade SoundCopy:Play() Delay(HitSoundDelay, (function() HitSoundPlayable = true end)) end
UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player)
local DamageValue = ((CurrentAnimation and CurrentAnimation.Damage) or TouchDamage) local FinalizedDamage = math.random(DamageValue.Min, DamageValue.Max)
if FinalizedDamage <= 0 then return end
humanoid:TakeDamage(FinalizedDamage)
end) return TouchedConnection end
function Attack(PossibleAnims) if not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped then return end if PossibleAnims and #PossibleAnims > 0 then local Animation = PossibleAnims[math.random(1, #PossibleAnims)] CurrentAnimation = Animation local AttackAnimation = CurrentAnimation InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", CurrentAnimation) AttackAnimation.Start = tick() if AttackAnimation.Duration and AttackAnimation.Duration > 0 then wait(AttackAnimation.Duration) AttackAnimation.Start = nil InvokeClient("StopAnimation", AttackAnimation) CurrentAnimation = nil end end end
function CreateBlade(Create) for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v ~= Handle then v:Destroy() end end if Create then ToolActive = false local BladeOffset = Vector3.new(0, -0.175, -0.0375) Blade = BaseBlade:Clone() Inner = BaseInner:Clone() for _, obj in next, Blade:GetChildren() do if obj and (obj:IsA("SurfaceLight") or obj:IsA("Beam")) then obj.Enabled = true elseif obj and obj:IsA("Motor6D") then obj:Destroy() end end InnerWeld = Instance.new("Motor6D") BladeWeld = Instance.new("Motor6D") InnerWeld.Part0 = Handle InnerWeld.Part1 = Inner InnerWeld.C0 = Blade.CFrame BladeWeld.Part0 = Handle BladeWeld.Part1 = Blade BladeWeld.C0 = CFrame.new((0 + BladeOffset.X), (((Handle.Size.Y / 2) + (BaseBlade.Size.Y / 2)) + BladeOffset.Y), ((((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + (BaseBlade.Size.Z / 2)) / 2) + BladeOffset.Z)) InnerWeld.C0 = CFrame.new((0 + BladeOffset.X), (((Handle.Size.Y / 2) + (BaseInner.Size.Y / 2)) + BladeOffset.Y), ((((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + (BaseBlade.Size.Z / 2)) / 2) + BladeOffset.Z)) BladeWeld.Parent = Blade InnerWeld.Parent = Inner -- local OriginalScale = Blade.Size -- Blade.Size = (Blade.Size * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)) if ToolEquipped then if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end local CurrentlyEquipped = true ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) Spawn(function() wait(0.5) if not ToolEquipped or not CurrentlyEquipped then return end Sounds.Equip.Sound:Play() Blade.Parent = Tool Inner.Parent = Tool local RiseRate = 25 for i = 1, RiseRate do if not ToolEquipped or not CurrentlyEquipped then break end -- Blade.Size = Vector3.new(OriginalScale.X, ((OriginalScale.Y / RiseRate) * i), OriginalScale.Z) -- BladeWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(BladeWeld.C0.X, ((Handle.Size.Y / 2) + (Blade.Size.Y * 2) + BladeOffset.Y), BladeWeld.C0.Z) wait(Rate) end wait(0.25) if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end if not ToolEquipped or not CurrentlyEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolActive = true Blow(Blade) end) end end end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not ToolEquipped or not ToolActive then return end Tool.Enabled = false local SlashSounds = {Sounds.Slash1, Sounds.Slash2, Sounds.Slash3} local SlashSound = SlashSounds[math.random(1, #SlashSounds)] SlashSound.Sound.Pitch = (math.random((SlashSound.Pitch.Min * 1000), (SlashSound.Pitch.Max * 1000)) * 0.001) SlashSound.Sound:Play() local AttackAnims = {Animations.Bash, Animations.Slash, Animations.InwardSlash, Animations.OutwardSlash, Animations.UpwardSlash, Animations.Spin, Animations.DownwardIdlePose, Animations.SideStepUpperSlash, Animations.Swipe} if Humanoid and Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then AttackAnims = {Animations.R15Bash, Animations.R15Slash, Animations.R15InwardSlash, Animations.R15OutwardSlash, Animations.R15UpwardSlash, Animations.R15Spin, Animations.R15DownwardIdlePose, Animations.R15SideStepUpperSlash, Animations.R15Swipe} end Attack(AttackAnims) Tool.Enabled = true end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Player and Player.Parent and Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) and true) or false) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Spawn(function() local Animation = Animations.Equip if Humanoid and Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then Animation = Animations.R15Equip end InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) end) Spawn(function() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do Spawn(function() InvokeClient("Preload", v.Animation.AnimationId) end) end for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do Spawn(function() InvokeClient("Preload", v.Sound.SoundId) end) end end) Spawn(function() CreateBlade(true) end) ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do if v and v.Sound and v.Sound.Parent then v.Sound:Stop() end end HitSoundPlayable = true local Sound = Sounds.HitPlayer Sound.Sound.Pitch = Sound.Pitch.Min Sound.Sound:Play() --Sounds.Unequip.Sound:Play() CreateBlade(false) ToolActive = false ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player ~= Player or not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() or not Mode or not Value then return end end)
CreateBlade(false)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end local CurrentlyEquipped = true if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end end) local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or Character:FindFirstChild("RightHand") if RightArm then local RightGrip = RightArm:WaitForChild("RightGrip") if RightGrip and CurrentlyEquipped and CurrentlyEquipped then RightGripMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") RightGripMotor.Name = "RightGrip" RightGripMotor.Part0 = RightGrip.Part0 RightGripMotor.Part1 = RightGrip.Part1 RightGripMotor.C0 = RightGrip.C0 RightGripMotor.C1 = RightGrip.C1 RightGrip:Destroy() RightGripMotor.Parent = RightArm end end end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs({RightGripMotor, ToolUnequipped}) do if tostring(v) == "Connection" then v:disconnect() elseif type(v) == "userdata" and v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end if RightGripMotor and RightGripMotor.Parent then RightGripMotor:Destroy() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider") RunService = game:GetService("RunService") UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
Rate = (1 / 60)
ToolEquipped = false
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop(value.FadeTime) table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end --Debris:AddItem(BodyGyro, 0.1) Animations = {} ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) return ServerReturn end) end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "PlaySound" and value then value:Play() elseif mode == "StopSound" and value then value:Stop() elseif mode == "Preload" and value then Spawn(function() ContentProvider:Preload(value) end) end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
